nodes.text: An aiwha pod was, according to Kaminoan legend, stopped by the god-beast Protas from swimming south for the Winter. Knowing they would die if they turned back north, the pod attacked. They struggled to defeat the powerful being, until one of them sacrificed himself by attacking Protas' soft throat, allowing the remaining aiwha to finally defeat him.
The pod appeared in the short story The Tale of the Aiwha Pod, published within the Star Wars: Republic Commando: Prima Official Game Guide in 2005.
